author: forthommel
body:
Follow-up of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/18461#issuecomment-301406407 to ensure a proper handling of the begin/end conditions through the usage of a `edm::contains` (instead of a home-brewed check).
This patch was tested on the conditions defined in [this HN thread](https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/prep-ops/3940/1/1/1/1/1.html) and successfully passed it.

`runTheMatrix.py -l limited` yielded `8 8 7 5 4 1 1 1 tests passed, 1 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 failed` at 483c88698325daada2d4782c0c70aa6a40b95159 (with the usual DAS error at `step1` of `4.22`)
title: CTPPS: bug fix #2 in run ranges for FEDs channels mapping
